objective: Fix errors, add calendar, gitmark, settings modules, integrate SolidOS, semantic tokens (SLP/VCs), OAuth, UI toolkits (pages-ui, work_ui), multilingual support, complete phases 5-11, enhance testing and documentation

pre_task.task: Read autonomous_build_status.json to identify the next uncompleted task (first task with no status or 'failed'). If none, start with Phase 1, Prompt 1.

prompts.log_errors: If error, log to Autobot_errors.json: {phase_id: 1, prompt_id: 1, issue: 'Error description', llm_details: 'Model name, version', date: '2025-07-12T22:00:00+10:00'}
If error, log to Autobot_errors.json: {phase_id: 1, prompt_id: 2, issue: 'Error description', llm_details: 'Model name, version', date: '2025-07-12T22:00:00+10:00'}

prompts.task: Create accessibility folder and define language supports as JSON-LD files.
Implement multilingual support across all modules and UI components.
